title: Sample Page
creator: manager-periospot
content:
This is an example page. It's different from a blog post because it will stay in one place and will show up in your site navigation (in most themes). Most people start with an About page that introduces them to potential site visitors. It might say something like this:

Hi there! I'm a bike messenger by day, aspiring actor by night, and this is my website. I live in Los Angeles, have a great dog named Jack, and I like piña coladas. (And gettin' caught in the rain.)

...or something like this:

The XYZ Doohickey Company was founded in 1971, and has been providing quality doohickeys to the public ever since. Located in Gotham City, XYZ employs over 2,000 people and does all kinds of awesome things for the Gotham community.

As a new WordPress user, you should go to your dashboard to delete this page and create new pages for your content. Have fun!

title: Periospot Library- The best ebooks and resources about Implant Dentistry
creator: manager-periospot
content:
[vc_row][vc_column][us_post_title align="center" tag="h1"][us_separator][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/2"][us_image image="3224" size="full" align="center" onclick="custom_link" link="url:http%3A%2F%2Fsubscribepage.io%2Fperiospot-17-immutable-laws-in-implant-dentistry-ebook|target:_blank" css="%7B%22default%22%3A%7B%22animation-name%22%3A%22afl%22%2C%22animation-delay%22%3A%221s%22%7D%7D"][us_separator][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/2"][vc_column_text]

The 17 Immutable Laws In Implant Dentistry

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]
  • Update of the scientific literature about implant dentistry.
  • Different topics and recommendations.
  • Full of illustrations and photos.
  • Links to the best content about dentistry.
Download this free resource today and start learning the fundamentals of implant dentistry.[/vc_column_text][us_btn label="Download Free Ebook" link="url:http%3A%2F%2Fsubscribepage.io%2Fperiospot-17-immutable-laws-in-implant-dentistry-ebook|target:_blank" css="%7B%22default%22%3A%7B%22width%22%3A%22200px%22%7D%7D"][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][us_separator size="small" show_line="1"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width="1/2"][us_image image="3226" onclick="custom_link" link="url:http%3A%2F%2Fsubscribepage.io%2Fguided-bone-regeneration-ebook|target:_blank" css="%7B%22default%22%3A%7B%22animation-name%22%3A%22afl%22%7D%7D"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/2"][vc_column_text]

Guided Bone Regeneration In Implant Dentistry

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]

Looking for a simple guide with the most common guided bone regeneration procedures?

We created this free ebook that will help you to understand some concepts about GBR in implant dentistry. Everything is explained with photos and illustrations.

Get the free guide for free.

[/vc_column_text][us_btn label="Download Free Ebook" link="url:http%3A%2F%2Fsubscribepage.io%2Fguided-bone-regeneration-ebook|target:_blank"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][us_separator size="small" show_line="1"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width="1/2"][us_image image="3231" onclick="custom_link" link="url:http%3A%2F%2Fsubscribepage.io%2Fconnective-tissue-graft-implant-dentistry-ebook|target:_blank"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/2"][vc_column_text]

Connective Tissue Grafts Harvesting Techniques Free Ebook

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]In this guide, you will find the tips and the fundamentals to get started with connective tissue grafts in your daily practice. Learn from the masters with this complete guide that will help you to understand what soft tissue grafting techniques you can use on different clinical solutions.[/vc_column_text][us_btn label="Download Free Ebook" link="url:http%3A%2F%2Fsubscribepage.io%2Fconnective-tissue-graft-implant-dentistry-ebook|title:Download%20the%20Ebook|target:_blank"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][us_separator size="small" show_line="1"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width="1/2"][us_image image="3247" onclick="custom_link" link="url:http%3A%2F%2Fsubscribepage.io%2F10-tips-about-implant-dentistry-ebook|target:_blank"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/2"][vc_column_text]

10 Tips About Aesthetic Implant Dentistry

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]The ideal ebook to start understanding the basics of implant dentistry from a biological and clinical point of view.[/vc_column_text][us_btn label="Download Free Ebook" link="url:http%3A%2F%2Fsubscribepage.io%2F10-tips-about-implant-dentistry-ebook|target:_blank"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width="1/2"][us_image image="4869" onclick="custom_link" link="url:https%3A%2F%2Fbooks.apple.com%2Fch%2Fbook%2Fguided-bone-regeneration%2Fid1117410261%3Fat%3D1l3vvUj%26uo%3D4|target:_blank"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/2"][vc_column_text]

Guided Bone regeneration iBook

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]The complete guide about guided bone regeneration in implant dentistry. This digital book is an upgrade of the successful ebook ‚ÄúGuided Bone Regeneration in Implant Dentistry‚Äù that had more than 10k downloads in its previous version. The goal of this ebook is to explain differently how to perform guided bone regeneration in implant dentistry. It includes a review of the scientific literature and bone biology. This book is the perfect guide for those starting in implant dentistry and also students who are performing their first cases with implants. To make it more entertaining, the ebook includes:
  • Surgery videos
  • Animations
  • Clinical Cases
  • Illustrations
  • Step by Step guide
[/vc_column_text][us_btn label="Buy iBook" link="url:https%3A%2F%2Fgeni.us%2Flandingpageibook|target:_blank"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width="1/2"][us_image image="4872" onclick="custom_link" link="url:https%3A%2F%2Fgeni.us%2Fikooklandingimmimplant|target:_blank"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/2"][vc_column_text]

Immediate Implants With Immediate provisional Restorations

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]iBook about immediate implants with a review of the available scientific literature related to immediate implants and immediate restorations. It includes:
  • Immediate implant scientific background
  • Video with connective tissue graft techniqueCAD/CAM customized abutment
  • Illustrations with the technique for the connective tissue graft
  • Aesthetic assessment for the clinical cases
  • Customized technique step by step to a single implant with an emergency profile. How to transfer information to the lab.
  • Socket shield technique
[/vc_column_text][us_btn label="Buy iBook" link="url:https%3A%2F%2Fgeni.us%2Fikooklandingimmimplant|target:_blank"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width="1/2"][us_image image="4874" onclick="custom_link" link="url:https%3A%2F%2Fgeni.us%2FiBooklandingpageiimmlo|target:_blank"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/2"][vc_column_text]

Immediate Loading and Immediate Restorations With CAD/CAM Prosthesis

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]Interactive iBook about immediate loading and restorations performed with CAD/CAM and digital impressions. Also, this iBook contains clinical cases that will help you implement an immediate workflow in your daily practice. This iBooks also contains:
  • Surgery videos
  • 3D files explaining the design of different components
  • Animations
  • Illustrations
  • And much more.
[/vc_column_text][us_btn label="Buy iBook" link="url:https%3A%2F%2Fgeni.us%2FiBooklandingpageiimmlo|target:_blank"][/vc_column][/vc_row]

content:
[vc_row][vc_column][vc_column_text]

Welcome to Periospot Online Learning Hub üéì

[/vc_column_text][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner][vc_column_text]On this page you will find Periospot featured online eLearning courses. The most remarkable online courses to help you to grow in your professional dental career.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width="1/2"][us_text text="How to Solve Implant Complications" icon="fas|star" css="%7B%22default%22%3A%7B%22color%22%3A%22%23045dd5%22%2C%22font-size%22%3A%220.75rem%22%2C%22margin-bottom%22%3A%2210px%22%7D%7D"][us_image image="4363" size="full" align="center" onclick="custom_link" link="url:https%3A%2F%2Fwww.masterclassindentistry.com%2Flink%2FPxmJdR%3Furl%3Dhttps%253A%252F%252Fwww.masterclassindentistry.com%252Fcourse%252Fmastering-implant-complications||target:%20_blank|" animate="fade"][us_separator size="small"][vc_column_text]

Mastering Implant Complications

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]

üéØ Find the real cause of trouble.

You will learn where to look and how to reveal the often hidden origins of complications, whether in the biology or the technical side. You will then master the restorative and surgical interactions that most commonly predispose you to trouble, and you will learn how to prevent problems by applying proper design principles.
[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]

‚öôÔ∏è Master repair and treatment

Whether technical, biological, or both, you will learn step by step how to design and execute successful problem-solving interventions. You will learn the techniques and tools you will need to manage complications, from complex hardware "rescue" operations to the treatment of Peri-implantitis, including respective and regenerative surgery.
[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]What's in this course for you:
  • 3 Modules - 1 free!
  • 16 Blitz- Webinars
  • 17 How-to Videos
  • Clinical step-by-step procedures and toolbox
  • 3 e-books
  • Readings, resources
  • Assessments
  • Certificate and transcript
  • Community - Alumni
  • Hands-on training (add-on)
  • Live sessions (add-on)
[/vc_column_text][us_btn label="Start the Mastering Implant Complications Course" link="url:https%3A%2F%2Fwww.masterclassindentistry.com%2Flink%2FPxmJdR%3Furl%3Dhttps%253A%252F%252Fwww.masterclassindentistry.com%252Fcourse%252Fmastering-implant-complications||target:%20_blank|"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/2"][us_text text="Social Media and Online Marketing" link_type="custom" link="url:https%3A%2F%2Fperiospot.typeform.com%2Fto%2Fr0fmnhal||target:%20_blank|" icon="fas|bullhorn" css="%7B%22default%22%3A%7B%22color%22%3A%22%234e6787%22%2C%22font-size%22%3A%220.75rem%22%2C%22margin-bottom%22%3A%2210px%22%7D%7D"][us_image image="3318" size="full" align="center"][us_separator size="small"][vc_column_text]

Social Media & Online Marketing for dentists

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]Language: English Duration: 3 hours Level: Intermediate Available: September 2020 Price: Early registration- 120‚Ç¨/ Regular price: 197‚Ç¨ Mentor: Francisco Teixeira Barbosa[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]Have you ever had the feeling that social media and marketing is not for you? Don¬¥t worry. You are not alone. In this course, we will address some of the main pain-points that we as dentists may find in our way to grow our social media and online presence. Table of contents:
  1. Introduction to social media and online marketing
  2. Why social media and online marketing
  3. Which social media channels should I manage
  4. What tools are the best to grow my social media presence
  5. Introduction to tips and tricks for:
    1. Instagram
    2. Facebook
    3. Twitter
    4. Youtube
    5. Linkedin
  6. Introduction to Facebooks and Instagram ads: Where to start
  7. Copywriting and SEO. Get your webpage ranked to the top Google search.
[/vc_column_text][us_btn label="Early application here (120‚Ç¨ instead of 197‚Ç¨)" link="url:https%3A%2F%2Fperiospot.typeform.com%2Fto%2Fr0fmnhal|||"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width="1/2"][us_text text="Implant Dentistry for Periospoters" icon="fas|star" css="%7B%22default%22%3A%7B%22color%22%3A%22%23045dd5%22%2C%22font-size%22%3A%220.75rem%22%2C%22margin-bottom%22%3A%2210px%22%7D%7D"][us_image image="3319" size="full" align="center" onclick="custom_link" link="url:https%3A%2F%2Fperiospot.typeform.com%2Fto%2FfRHBOwRo||target:%20_blank|"][us_separator show_line="1"][vc_column_text]

Implant Dentistry for Periospoters

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]Language: English Duration: 5 hours Level: Intermediate Available: September 2020 Price: Early registration- 180‚Ç¨/ Regular price: 290‚Ç¨ Mentors: Daniel Robles & Francisco Teixeira Barbosa[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]A comprehensive online course about implant dentistry with the best contents about implant dentistry. Table of contents:
  1. Introduction to implant dentistry
  2. Biological and clinical considerations
  3. Case selection and case planning
  4. Aesthetic implant dentistry: How to start managing aesthetic cases with implants:
    1. Case evaluation
    2. Protocols in the aesthetic zone
    3. Soft tissue procedures for volume augmentation
    4. Guide bone regeneration in the aesthetic zone
  5. Surgical considerations
  6. Restorative options
  7. Digital Implant Dentistry: What is possible and how to get started
[/vc_column_text][us_btn label="Apply for early release price (180‚Ç¨ instead of 290‚Ç¨)" link="url:https%3A%2F%2Fperiospot.typeform.com%2Fto%2FfRHBOwRo|||"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/2"][/vc_column][/vc_row]

a:3:{s:11:"plugin_name";s:9:"WordPress";s:11:"policy_text";s:4465:"

Who we are

Suggested text: Our website address is: https://periospot.com.

Comments

Suggested text: When visitors leave comments on the site we collect the data shown in the comments form, and also the visitor’s IP address and browser user agent string to help spam detection.

An anonymized string created from your email address (also called a hash) may be provided to the Gravatar service to see if you are using it. The Gravatar service privacy policy is available here: https://automattic.com/privacy/. After approval of your comment, your profile picture is visible to the public in the context of your comment.

Media

Suggested text: If you upload images to the website, you should avoid uploading images with embedded location data (EXIF GPS) included. Visitors to the website can download and extract any location data from images on the website.

Cookies

Suggested text: If you leave a comment on our site you may opt-in to saving your name, email address and website in cookies. These are for your convenience so that you do not have to fill in your details again when you leave another comment. These cookies will last for one year.

If you visit our login page, we will set a temporary cookie to determine if your browser accepts cookies. This cookie contains no personal data and is discarded when you close your browser.

When you log in, we will also set up several cookies to save your login information and your screen display choices. Login cookies last for two days, and screen options cookies last for a year. If you select "Remember Me", your login will persist for two weeks. If you log out of your account, the login cookies will be removed.

If you edit or publish an article, an additional cookie will be saved in your browser. This cookie includes no personal data and simply indicates the post ID of the article you just edited. It expires after 1 day.

Embedded content from other websites

Suggested text: Articles on this site may include embedded content (e.g. videos, images, articles, etc.). Embedded content from other websites behaves in the exact same way as if the visitor has visited the other website.

These websites may collect data about you, use cookies, embed additional third-party tracking, and monitor your interaction with that embedded content, including tracking your interaction with the embedded content if you have an account and are logged in to that website.

Who we share your data with

Suggested text: If you request a password reset, your IP address will be included in the reset email.

How long we retain your data

Suggested text: If you leave a comment, the comment and its metadata are retained indefinitely. This is so we can recognize and approve any follow-up comments automatically instead of holding them in a moderation queue.

For users that register on our website (if any), we also store the personal information they provide in their user profile. All users can see, edit, or delete their personal information at any time (except they cannot change their username). Website administrators can also see and edit that information.

What rights you have over your data

Suggested text: If you have an account on this site, or have left comments, you can request to receive an exported file of the personal data we hold about you, including any data you have provided to us. You can also request that we erase any personal data we hold about you. This does not include any data we are obliged to keep for administrative, legal, or security purposes.

Where your data is sent

Suggested text: Visitor comments may be checked through an automated spam detection service.

Mastering Implant Complications!

What is this Masterclass about?

Find the real cause of trouble

You will learn where to look and how to reveal the often hidden origins of complications, whether in the biology or the technical side.¬†

Then, you will master the restorative and surgical interactions which most commonly predispose to the trouble and you will learn how to prevent problems by applying proper design principles¬† ¬†

Master repair and treatment

Whether technical,¬†biological, or both, you will learn step by step how to design and execute successful problem-solving interventions.¬†

You will learn the techniques and tools you will need to manage complications, from complex hardware "resque" operations to the¬†treatment of Peri-implantitis, including resective and regenerative surgery.¬†

Why should I take this course?

If you have worked with dental implants long enough, you will know by now that complications are part of the picture. Whether veneer chippings, screw problems, or peri-implant tissue inflammation, studies show that 3 in 5 patients will encounter some complication within the first years in function. Such complications can be difficult to resolve and lead to significant¬†problems for our patients.

The truth however is that many of the most common complications can be prevented through proper design, or identified early enough for successful management.¬†

If you are practicing implant dentistry at any level, this¬†course will be an invaluable contribution to your practice.¬†

  • You will learn which¬†¬†designs can often predispose to the trouble and how to streamline your treatment plans to prevent complications
  • You will learn how to design comprehensive clinical examination and maintenance protocols,¬†ensuring lasting successor early detection of complications

ITI Treatment Guide, Volume 10, Implant Therapy in the Esthetic Zone, Current Treatment Modalities and Materials for Single-tooth Replacements

This latest volume in the ITI Treatment Guide series starts out with the most recent statements and recommendations from the 5th ITI Consensus Conference, followed by a detailed protocol for the evaluation and treatment planning of patients with esthetic demands requiring single-tooth replacement with a dental implant.

This volume provides a comprehensive, evidence-based approach to single-tooth replacement in the esthetic zone, from consultation to follow-up, with a focus on current treatment modalities and the materials that present-day implant dentistry has to offer in order to support clinicians in their decision-making processes.

title: Cisco¬¥s Workstation
creator: Francisco
content:
Cisco¬¥s Workstation

In this post I share with you my workstation and what gadgets may also be useful for you.

Often, after sharing pics on Instagram of my workstation or after a webinar, some people ask me "Ey, what is that thing you have to+ random object with a function".

I feel that these questions that I had, mainly during the COVID-19 lockdown, deserved a short article to describe what are the main gadgets I use on the working station and what are their function.

First of all, I would like to share with you a pic of my workstation.

It is not a quite advanced workstation, but rather a functional workplace.

Let¬¥s start describing some items:

iMac 2019 with 27- inch screen

The image I'm currently using is the iMac (Retina 5K, 27-inch, 2019) with a 3,6 GHz 8-Core Intel Core i9 processor and a memory of 32 GB 2667 MHz DDR4.

I choose this one after almost ten years with an iMac from 2010 (KIA). I upgraded the processor and memory because I use a lot After Effects, Illustrator, and Final Cut X at the same time.

if you don't want to see your machine suffering, you should think about improving your iMac to have a seamless workflow with as few crashes as possible.

Buy online

DSLR Camera- Nikon D610

This camera I use it to do home videos with a 35 mm lens or also to use it to document clinical cases.

Is a full frame camera and has been with me the last 4 years.

Now I¬¥m working on using it as a webcam to improve the quality on webinars and other online initiatives.

Buy online

iMac/PC Support

I accidentally found it on Instagram and I immediately placed the order (one of the bad things, when you are on lockdown, is start buying a lot of gadgets). It helps me to keep my desktop organized and cables organized.

Sometimes I forget I have so my cables and the workstation looks almost cordless.

Buy support online

USB Mic Blue Yeti

This Mic is in my opinion the best one considering the relationship price/quality. Outstanding performance and now available the new version.

I¬¥ve been using this mic in the past 7 years. Sometimes I use it also for guitar playing and singing (poor mic üòÖ).

There is a new Yeti Mic Version.

Buy Yeti Blue USB Mic

100 mm Macro lens

This lens is the ones I recommend to use for clinical documentation but I also found them very useful for screen recording. Also, if you like macro photography you will enjoy this lens.

Buy online

Computer elbow and wrist pad

After the lockdown, I realized I need this thing. My wrist was almost in blood after being every day almost 8-10 hours in front of the computer. Cheap and saves you some painful callus.

Buy online

Also there are some items that are not in the picture but I also find them relevant:

Lightning: 19 inch LED Ring Light with LCD Display Adjustable Color Temperature 3000K-5800K 

This one I bought it to record my online classes and also webinars. It¬¥s amazing how with just a few hundred bucks you can buy good quality lightning kits.

Buy online

K&F Concept Camera Tripod

I found this new brand. Is affordable and the quality is quite good.

Buy online

Conclusion

Nowadays you can find a huge offering and variety on internet and once in a while you can receive newsletters with bargains and other promotions.

This is my workstation at the moment, although I have to say that I¬¥m always trying to find new gadgtes that can help me to feel more comfortable when working from home.

If you have any insights or feedback, please drop me an email. I¬¥ll would to love know about your setup.
